main.title: Hello. I am Emil Ibraimov.
main.description:
A front-end developer with 3.5 years of experience specializing in creating responsive and user-friendly web applications using modern frameworks like React and Next.js.
 I'm passionate about solving complex problems, continuously learning new technologies, and building clean, maintainable code. This website showcases my technical expertise and projects that highlight my skills in real-time applications, state management, and asynchronous operations.
